attributes.action: Provide yearly breakdowns of exactly where our taxes go.
attributes.background: For the last few years we have heard of cutbacks on the NHS, police funding and emergency services. Yet as a country we can afford royal weddings, renovations such as Big Ben costing £61M? As tax payers we should have a honest breakdown of our taxes and where they are going

rejection.details:
HMRC already sends a personalised tax summary every year which shows how tax was spent, so we're not sure exactly what action you'd like the Government to take.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/annual-tax-summary
